question.title: No query executer factory registered for the 'plsql' language
question.body:
I have a simple report that displays fields from database. I can preview the report successfully from Jasper, but when it is called from Java , i'm getting exception. I'm using jasper 7.0.3.

Failed to generate report: com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException: No query executer factory registered for the \"plsql\" language.\n at [Source: (ByteArrayInputStream); line: 16, column: 209] (through reference chain: net.sf.jasperreports.engine.design.JasperDesign[\"query\"])
